7 deletion syndrome inherit an unbalanced translocation that deletes genetic material near the end of the long arm of chromosome 2, which results in birth defects and other health problems characteristic of this disorder.",GHR,2q37 deletion syndrome
What are the treatments for 2q37 deletion syndrome ?,These resources address the diagnosis or management of 2q37 deletion syndrome:  - Gene Review: Gene Review: 2q37 Microdeletion Syndrome  - Genetic Testing Registry: Brachydactyly-Mental Retardation
